payment_type.title: Payment type
TRD: For this payment method, you must configure the eligible amounts as well as indicate the shipping costs that may or may not be excluded on the Payment methods page.
The payment method will not be usable if no product in the order is eligible.
If the ceiling is exceeded or if the product order contains non-eligible products, an additional credit card will be requested.
